title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Adarga are a software company which specialise in AI solutions for intelligence organisations. My primary role involves the development of React Front-End UIs for new and existing tools.

title: Software Engineer
description: Gresham Technologies provide a variety of software products for financial firms. I designed, estimated and implemented new features, refactoring and improving existing code when necessary. The primary languages I used were JavaScript (TypeScript & React) and GraphQL. I also used Java (Spring), Clojure, and SQL (MYSQL, Oracle, MSSQL) in this role.

title: Software Engineer
description: Jeppesen UK (a subsidiary of Boeing) are an aviation company, the digital portion of which provides tools for aviation clients. My role within the team was to develop new features for a post-flight data analysis application. Our team operated with Agile methodologies. Languages used were JavaScript, Java and MySQL.

title: Software Development Engineer
description:
ETS Aviation was a company providing cost saving solutions for airlines, helping them reduce their fuel consumption and comply with emission regulations. My primary role was to develop data ingestion software. Languages used were JavaScript, PHP and MySQL.

One task required the migration of our codebase to Git and the training of team members in using the new version control system.

title: Web Developer
description: Better Brief was a firm specialising in bespoke websites for both small and large businesses. My role was to maintain the websites of existing clients and to work with the team in developing websites for new clients. Languages used were JavaScript, PHP and MySQL.
